summary: Just a small edit to the Dark Brotherhood armor, currently only female version doing a bunch of stuff right now.
descriptionHtml:
Extract the files to Skyrim -> Data, merge the files and you\'re set. If you have other texture mods added for dark brother hood, you may get a prompt to overwrite them so be careful and back up your files!


Although this is just a simple recolor so it\'s not something to feel super proud of, I like how it turned out though. For those of you who prefer blue/black schemes over the horrendous black/red one (Mythic Dawn eww). Then you might find this tex to your liking, I personally prefer this blue version over the red.

Currently I\'ve only done the female version, working on alot of other stuff including the male. So it will be updated asap.
author: Kitsune32
